ing: salt and ground black pepper to taste
des:
"This is perfect for anyone doing a keto diet! It tastes great on vegetables of almost any kind and it helps boost your fat intake. 

To me, it has almost a ranch type flavor. It's smooth yet tangy."
ins: Mix mayonnaise, sour cream, salt, and pepper together in a small saucepan over low heat; cook and stir until warm, about 3 minutes.
